info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 15 at 8:37PM EDT until June 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 101 expected. * WHERE...Marion County. * WHEN...From Noon to 8 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...High temperature and humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
